meanings.definition: A place of business or residence
meanings.sent1: The local establishments in our town include a bakery and a bookstore.
meanings.sent2: Many people visit establishments like restaurants and hotels every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the house was its own establishment and refused to leave.
meanings.sent4: Her cozy little cafe was an establishment of warmth and comfort in the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The historic hotel stood as an establishment of elegance and grandeur.

meanings.definition: The act of establishing or setting up
meanings.sent1: The establishment of new rules helped maintain order in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The establishment of a new company requires careful planning and investment.
meanings.sent3: The establishment of a secret handshake between friends added an element of fun to their meetings.
meanings.sent4: The establishment of a routine can make daily tasks more efficient.
meanings.sent5: The establishment of a garden transformed the backyard into a peaceful retreat.

meanings.sent1: The local club was a popular establishment where members gathered for events.
meanings.sent2: The establishment of a charity aimed to help those in need in the community.
meanings.sent3: The penguin society was an establishment dedicated to the conservation of Antarctic wildlife.
meanings.sent4: The establishment of a book club brought together avid readers in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The establishment of a museum showcased the rich history of the region.
